sentences.en: A tiny asterisk conducted me to a footnote at the bottom of the page.
sentences.cn: 一个小小的星形符号把我的目光引到了那页底部一个说明上。

sentences.en: Articles marked by an asterisk are optional reading.
sentences.cn: 标示有星号的文章为选读.

sentences.en: Asterisk Cracker is designed for the hidden with asterisks fields scanning.
sentences.cn: 星号脆饼被设计为躲,星号地扫描.

sentences.en: Dagger: Dagger - shaped symbol used asf footnote reference mark . Usually follows the asterisk in order of use.
sentences.cn: 剑号: 作脚注用的剑形符号,它的使用权用次序是跟着星号.

sentences.en: Is it possible to declare variables in VHDL with an asterisk?
sentences.cn: 有可能在硬件描述语言（VHDL）声明变量与一个星号?。

sentences.en: It might be handy to remember that the namestring can contain wildcard characters (asterisk is the only supported character but you can use several in the namestring.
sentences.cn: 记住名称字符串可以包含通配符会很方便（虽然星号是惟一支持的字符，但是可以在名称字符串中使用多个。

sentences.en: Items marked with an asterisk can be omitted.
sentences.cn: 打星号的项目可以删去。

sentences.en: Linguistics An asterisk used to indicate an unattested sound, affix, or word.
sentences.cn: 用于表明未被证实的音, 词缀或词的星号.

sentences.en: The 21 st century students English newspaper articles with an asterisk are graded, the more difficult, more.
sentences.cn: 《二十一世纪学生英文报》上的文章都以星号分级, 星号越多,难度越大.

sentences.en: The asterisk after " Reduced to $ 1.95 " refers to a footnote reading " Today only. "
sentences.cn: 在“减至一点九五元 ” 后,有个星号标示着一个注脚,上面写着 “ 只限今天. ”

sentences.en: The asterisk character is believed to be related to the understanding of ancient people on astrology.
sentences.cn: 星号符号据认为讲述是远古人类对占星术的理解.

sentences.en: The asterisk refers the reader to a footnote.
sentences.cn: 星号是让读者参看脚注.

sentences.en: The asterisk refers to a footnote.
The first part is the period asterisk characters, .*, which here means anything before any number of spaces and the group (.*?).
sentences.cn: 第一部分是点号和星号字符 .* ，它们在这里表示 任意数量的空格和 (.*?) 组之前的任何字符 。

sentences.en: The plug-in names followed by an asterisk are those that were loaded during startup.
sentences.cn: 后面跟有一个星号的插件名是那些在启动的时候就加载的插件。

sentences.en: Then, regardless of what character a user types in the text box, an asterisk is displayed.
sentences.cn: 然后, 无论用户在文本框中键入什么字符, 都显示为星号.

sentences.en: Use the value from the previous bar for all asterisk - marked indicators!
sentences.cn: 使用该指标值从以前的酒吧为所有星号标记的指标!

sentences.en: You can use the asterisk anywhere in a string.
sentences.cn: 可在字符串中的任意位置使用星号.

trans.tran_en: a mark like a star (*), used especially to show something interesting or important
